titles: A seasonable vindication of the truly catholick doctrine of the Church of England in reply to Dr. Sherlock's answer to Anonymus his three letters concerning church-communion.
author: Atwood, William, d. 1705?
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707. --  Letter to Anonymous, in answer to his three letters to Dr. Sherlock.
Lord's Supper and Christian union --  Early works to 1800.
